PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-03512018-03-26,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  NR,  CRA
ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
SubjectCRA- PIPSC - Employees in the Audit, Financial and Scientific Group bargaining unit ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder approving that the CANADA REVENUE AGENCY enter into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the PROFESSIONAL INSTITUTE OF THE PUBLIC SERVICE OF CANADA that covers all employees in the Audit, Financial and Scientific Group bargaining unit for the period beginning on December 22, 2014 and ending on December 21, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
